Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
Welcome to the first episode of season six of the Azure Essentials Show series: Armchair Architects. Host David Blank-Edelman is joined as always by Uli Homann CVP at Microsoft, and Eric Charran (@mougue) , Executive Director and at Intuit for the first episode in a season dedicated to exploring AI agents from a cloud solution architect’s perspective. This episode sets the stage by defining what AI agents are, distinguishing them from chatbots, and discussing their growing importance in today’s technology landscape.
